content: Hi, is the 4.0 version of the server developed in the master branch on git, or is there a separate branch? I'm running a server which is on version ZULIP_VERSION: 3.0-1012-g4917391133, and sometimes get error messages when users try to post something. I want to see if updating from git helps, but I don't want to update past the branch point of the next stable release, as I want to use that eventually.
This page says I can update using the command /home/zulip/deployments/current/scripts/upgrade-zulip-from-git master
@Jonas F yes, that's correct. The master branch will be released as 4.0 when we're ready to do so.
